title: Falling From The Sky
description: It all began in 1982 when a baby boy was found in the wilderness. He was then named Adji. Over time, little Adji grew up, and like most teenagers, he began to feel an attraction to the opposite sex. Lisa was his first love and the biggest crush of his life. One day, Lisa got shot in the cafe where she worked. Miraculously, Adji healed her. He did not know he had such ability. He and Lisa decided to keep it a secret.By accident, Adji met Ptaah who came from Planet Erra. The man explained about Adjiâ€™s ability and why he had it. He also mentioned that his healing powers could have useful effects on humans. From then on, Adji began to maximize his ability to save Lisa.In the meantime, the investigation of the shooting incident began. Antonio, the policeman who ran the investigation, obtained three names as potential suspects. However, despite all the suspects being fully investigated, the case remained unsolved. Antonio then tried to look at the case from a different perspective. He finally ended up working hand in hand with the UFO community.
author: Joannes Rhino Setyanto
